name: Nathan Never: The Arcade Game
overview: Nathan Never is a 2D (with many parallax scrolling layers) side-scrolling run and gun arcade game, based on Italian comics series with this same title.The player controls Nathan Never - a special agent in a dystopian future. He goes between various locations, avoids and shoots enemies, jumps over obstacles/holes etc.. Game has several "adventure" aspects - Nathan Never can search bodies and talk with people (but only in Italian - normal part of interface is in English). He has 1 life - when he loses life, game is over.
